executive_summary: Implementation of an AI-powered CRM system to improve sales efficiency.
project_scope: Develop a cloud-based CRM system with AI capabilities for sales prediction and customer segmentation.
technical_details: Use Python for backend, React for frontend, and integrate TensorFlow for AI models.

executive_summary: Upgrade legacy systems to a modern ERP solution for better resource management.
project_scope: Migrate from legacy systems to a cloud-based ERP solution with real-time analytics.
technical_details: Use Java for backend, Angular for frontend, and integrate AWS for cloud hosting.

executive_summary: Develop a mobile app for remote workforce management.
project_scope: Build a cross-platform mobile app for tracking employee productivity and task management.
technical_details: Use Flutter for cross-platform development and Firebase for backend services.
